name: Maryellen TV Console
description:
Meet Maryellen Larkin, a girl growing up in the 1950s—a time when television was just taking off! Tune in to watch scenes from Maryellen’s world. Then make your own 1950s-style TV clips to show your friends. Or turn on Maryellen’s favorite songs and have a sock hop in your living room. Use the app with the Maryellen TV Console toy for even more nifty, 50s fun.

To learn more about Maryellen, or to find more games and activities, visit www.americangirl.com/play/beforever/characters/maryellen

Game Features
• 5 video themes
• 6 original songs
• Endless play
• Compatible with iPad 2, iPad (3rd generation), iPad (4th generation), iPad Air
• Designed for play with the Maryellen TV Console toy
